args: if echo "$ASSISTANT_MESSAGE" | grep -iE '(decide|choose|select|which|would you|do you want|prefer|please|you)' > /dev/null; then ~/.claude-code-notifier/notify.sh input; fi
onAssistantMessage.description: Detect if Claude needs user input or choice and send notification

args: case "$TOOL_NAME" in TodoWrite) if echo "$TOOL_RESULT" | grep -qE 'completed.*100%|all.*completed'; then ~/.claude-code-notifier/notify.sh complete; fi ;; *) ;; esac
onToolUse.description: Detect when all tasks are completed and send notification
